name: Ringo + Zingo
description:
Controller(s) Highly Recommended

Share a controller with another player or use 2 separate controllers to help Ringo and Zingo reach the end! Each player gets separate abilities and must cooperate to get the combined Ringo and Zingo through 5 platforming challenges. Have fun!

Created for Northwestern's Game Design Studio course by:

Kyle Engelmann

Alyssa Liu

Darren Liu

All sound effects from zapsplat, all other assets our own.
